name: Pentel GraphGear 1000 Mechanical Pencil, (0.5mm) Point Size, Black Barrel, 1 Each (PG1015A)
short_description: Superior drafting pencil for professionals and enthusiasts
Easily identify your lead type with the built-in lead hardness indicator
Dual-action retractor advances and retracts pencil tip to protect lead from breaking
Finely chiseled metallic grip inlaid with soft, latex-free pads
4mm tip length makes it ideal for use with rulers and templates
Pre-loaded with Pentel Super Hi-Polymer HB lead; never needs sharpening, is super strong and produces a clear dark line
0.3mm, 0.5mm, 0.7mm & 0.9mm sizes available; color coded sizes for fast & easy size lead size identification
Comes with a cap to keep your eraser clean
product_description: The Pentel® GraphGear 1000 mechanical pencil is a superior drafting pencil for architects, draftsmen, artists and enthusiasts. The 4mm tip design makes it ideal for use with rulers and templates. A unique, dual-action retractor advances and retracts the pencil tip to protect lead from breaking. The built-in lead hardness indicator allows you to easily identify your lead type. It comes pre-loaded with Super Hi-Polymer® HB lead, which never needs sharpening and produces a clear dark line. The finely chiseled metallic grip inlaid with soft, latex-free pads makes extended writing and drawing comfortable. It is backed by Pentel’s Limited Lifetime Warranty.

ERASER REFILLS: The larger-than-ordinary and long-lasting eraser will help to prevent frequent mistakes. The latex-free erasers will not smudge, ghost, or tear your paper.
PENTEL RECYCOLOGY: Quality You Can Trust - Our eco-friendly products are made of 100% recycled plastic and have been setting the standard for quality for over 70 years with the Deming Award.
SMOOTH DARK LEAD LINES: The Pentel mechanical pencil lead refills are a consistent, smooth writing lead that produces a clear, dark line. The lead is guaranteed to scan on all tests and documents
